灰.definition: ash; dust; lime; gray; discouraged; dejected

灰不溜丟.definition: gloomy and dull (idiom); boring and gray; unpleasantly murky

灰不溜秋.definition: see 灰不溜丟|灰不溜丢[hui1 bu5 liu1 diu1]
